isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-8609 SERIES - CHANGING THE INPUT SHAFT - REASSEMBLY

step1.para: If necessary, replace the bushing in the input shaft pocket.
Install the snap ring in the snap ring groove inside the drive gear.
Install the drive gear spacer on the input shaft.
Install the drive gear bearing on the input shaft and into the case bore.
Install the bearing retainer snap ring.
Install the front bearing cover and gasket. Make sure to align the oil return hole in the case with the hole in the cover.
To facilitate proper installation of the shifter housing assembly on the case, make sure the mainshaft sliding clutches are placed in the neutral position.
Install the shifter housing assembly, the front bearing cover and all other parts and assemblies previously removed, making sure to replace the gaskets.
